website_summaries.verdict: A great way to jump into the newer Power Rangers line without spending too much up front.
pros: Tops the want list for many preschoolers
Can be combined with other Zord Builder items to make various Megazords
Missile launcher is a nice plus
cons: Parts can fall off too easily and reattaching may be frustrating for some
Kids will eventually want the other Builder Zords, too

customer_reviews.title: Best Power Rangers toy we have bought so far for ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Power Rangers toy we have bought so far for my five year old. Great quality, and it keeps her entertained for hours at a time. The only downside is that now we have to get all the other colors ;)
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Beyond frustrated
customer_reviews.text: All I've heard since he opened this on his birthday is whining from frustration. It falls apart constantly. When he tries to play with it it falls apart. I'm tempted to throw it away the only thing that stops me is knowing I paid good money for it.
customer_reviews.author: MommYallup

customer_reviews.title: ... was a gift for my grandson and he just loved it. It was his favorite present out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson and he just loved it. It was his favorite present out of all for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Casey

customer_reviews.title: Add ons get $$$$$
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these toys but you need to buy a bunch of extra pieces just to do all the cool options on the outside of box. $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: L. Staben

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson collects these figures. He was very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Son is happy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas for my 5 year old who loves power rangers. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Baltazar

customer_reviews.title: Once The Dinos Go Black, They Can't Come Back.......
customer_reviews.text: First Dino Supercharge Zord grab: This, although somewhat neccessary repaint of the Red Ranger's T-Rex zord gone BLACK. This should've been part of the Limited Edition Dino Charge Megazord like it should because in Kyoryuger's toyline there is an ALL BLACK version of this via seen in the Kyoryger v. Go Busters movie (which featured the Dino Ranger teamup compraising of Zyuranger/MMPR, Abaranger/Dino Thunder and Kyoryuger/Dino Charge). Wait until I get the Limited Edition Dino Charge Megazord and attach the Black versions of the Stego and Tricera Zords, then there would've been the TRUE version. Other than that, Awesome to have.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Marsh Jr.Top Contributor: Power Rangers

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved his Dino Super charge
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved his Dino Super charge. HE actually got 2 and wanted to keep them both to play against each other. Received faster than expected. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Berard

customer_reviews.title: My child was very disappointed that it was messed up
customer_reviews.text: The dino charger did not work. My child was very disappointed that it was messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his birthday less than a month ago and it’s already falling to pieces. The parts are designed to twist and pop on and off to go from dino to zord to megazord and the parts no longer stay on. Basically plastic garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: SBry

product_meta.title: Power Rangers Dino Super Charge - Deluxe Black T-Rex Zord Action Figure
product_meta.description: Sledge and his henchmen don't stand a chance against the Power Rangers Dino Super Charge Deluxe Zords! Each supersized Deluxe Zord is charged up and ready to fight. Insert the included Dino Charger to reveal epic battle launchers, and launch missiles to defeat the enemy! Collect and combine with any of the other Zord Builder items (43070, 43095, 43100, 43110, each sold separately) to create unique and powerful Megazord combinations. Each Deluxe Zord includes 1 Dino Charger that can also be inserted into other Power Ranger Dino Super Charge items, including the Deluxe Morpher (43000), Battle Gear (43035, 43045, 43050) and items in the Zord Builder collection (43095 & 43100). Each sold separately. Collect them all!.
feature_bullets: Sledge and his henchmen don't stand a chance against the Power Rangers Dino Super Charge Deluxe Zords; 2 ways to play
Power up with Dino Charger; insert the included Dino Charger to reveal epic battle launchers, and launch missiles to defeat the enemy
Each supersized Deluxe Zord is charged up and ready to fight; collect them all (each sold separately)
Combine with Zord Builder items (each sold separately); create unique and powerful Megazord combinations
Includes 1 Dino Charger that can also be inserted into other Power Ranger Dino Super Charge items

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
